news.title: Here’s Why Optimizing Images In Google My Business Is Important
news.description: Uploading your own high-resolution, professional photos to your GMB listing instead of relying on user photos is one of the ways you can boost your listing’s effectiveness and appeal.

news.title: Google Launches New Podcast Promising Undocumented Information
news.description: A new podcast will reportedly feature information regarding some of what goes on behind the scenes at Google, along with discussion regarding future projects that are in the works.

news.title: How YouTube Ranks Suggested Videos
news.description: A research paper from Google illuminates how deep learning regarding user behavior and video optimization by creators impact the way suggested videos are ranked in YouTube.

news.title: Google Ads Shortens Business Identity Verification Time
news.description: Google has amended the identity verification time frame for businesses running Google Ads, giving them 21 days to submit documentation before they receive a 7-day warning.
